mapper.sql: id, personal_id, personal_name, department_name, reward_date, reward_kind, reward_amount, description
mapper.insert: insert into personal_reward(personal_id, personal_name, department_name, reward_date, reward_kind, reward_amount, description) values(#{personalId},#{personalName}, #{departmentName}, #{rewardDate}, #{rewardKind}, #{rewardAmount}, #{description})
mapper.update:
update personal_reward
personal_id = #{personalId},
personal_name = #{personalName},
department_name = #{departmentName},
position_name = #{positionName},
reward_date = #{rewardDate},
reward_kind = #{rewardKind},
reward_amount = #{rewardAmount},
description = #{description},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select pr.*, pr.personal_id as personalId, pr.personal_name as personalName, pr.department_name as departmentName, pr.reward_date as rewardDate, pr.reward_kind as rewardKind, pr.reward_amount as rewardAmount from personal_reward pr left join personal p on pr.personal_id = p.id left join department d on pr.department_name = d.department_name where pr.id = #{id}

select pr.*, pr.personal_id as personalId, pr.personal_name as personalName, pr.position_name as positionName, pr.department_name as departmentName, pr.reward_date as rewardDate, pr.reward_kind as rewardKind, pr.reward_amount as rewardAmount from personal_reward pr left join personal p on pr.personal_id = p.id left join department d on pr.department_name = d.department_name left join position ps on pr.position_name = ps.position_name
